```{r}
# xls files
my_data <- read_csv("/Users/lilyholden/Desktop/3_Distance_moved.csv", show_col_types = TRUE)
my_data
```
```{r}
Distance_moved_means <- my_data %>%  
  group_by(Tree_sp) %>%  
  summarize(Distance_moved_means=mean(Distance_moved_m), sd_Distance_moved=sd(Distance_moved_m),  
            N_N=n(),  
            se=sd_Distance_moved/sqrt(N_N),  
            upper_limit=Distance_moved_means+se,  
            lower_limit=Distance_moved_means-se
  )  
Distance_moved_means
```


```{r}
ggplot(Distance_moved_means, aes(x=Tree_sp, y=Distance_moved_means)) +  
geom_bar(stat="identity") +  
geom_errorbar(aes(ymin=lower_limit, ymax=upper_limit))
```
